snippet.title: RIFT: Nightmare Tide Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play for free in the RIFT Nightmare Tide expansion! Wield new Mastery Abilities and Minions as you ascend to Level 65, battling through new zones, dungeons, and raids across the majestic Plane of Water.  

Learn more about Nightmare Tide, prepare for adventure with Collector’s Editions stuffed with digital goodies, and download RIFT for free at RIFTgame.com today!
